name: Kelly et ux. v. Yount, Appellant

judges: Before Sohapfer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Barnes and Patterson, JJ.
parties: Kelly et ux. v. Yount, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The majority of the members of this court, Mr.. Chief Justice Schaffer and Mr. Justice Linn dissenting, agree that the judgments of the learned Superior Court should be affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Hirt, reported at 135 Pa. Superior Ct. 528.
Judgments affirmed.

attorneys: . William A. Challener, Jr., with him William A. Challener, ot Challener & Challener, for appellant.
S. S. Millar, with him Brandon & Brandon, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kelly et ux. v. Yount, Appellant.
Argued March 18, 1940.
Before Sohapfer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Barnes and Patterson, JJ.
. William A. Challener, Jr., with him William A. Challener, ot Challener & Challener, for appellant.
S. S. Millar, with him Brandon & Brandon, for appellee.
April 15, 1940:
